home.whoWeAreP1: Raut Farmer Producer Company is a collective of passionate farmers from the heart of India's orange country. We came together with a shared dream: to combine our ancestral knowledge with modern agricultural science to grow exceptional produce while uplifting our community.
home.whoWeAreP2: Our cooperative model ensures that every farmer benefits from shared resources, technology, and market access, creating a sustainable and prosperous future for all.
home.glanceP1: Our experienced agronomists provide customized guidance based on soil composition, water availability, crop stage, and market demands. This personalized approach helps farmers achieve better yields and balanced grading.
home.glanceP2: Our experts go beyond just advice to help create success stories in the fields. From soil to market, their knowledge turns challenges into opportunities, ensuring not just better crops but also consistency, quality, and excellence.
home.service1Desc: We use eco-friendly farming practices to grow high-quality oranges, ensuring a healthier planet and a healthier you.
home.service2Desc: Using state-of-the-art technology, we sort and grade our oranges to meet the highest standards of quality and size.
home.service3Desc: From soil health to market, we support our farmers at every stage, creating a thriving agricultural ecosystem.
home.missionDesc: Raut Farmer Producer Company's mission is to create a strong platform for small and marginal farmers, helping them lead a respectable life with financial freedom and social upliftment. We are committed to improving their livelihoods by organizing farmers, standardizing their processes, enhancing production, and promoting sustainability. Our mission is to empower the weaker sections of society and support their overall economic and social development.
home.visionDesc: Raut Farmer Producer Company's vision is to support better growth for farmers and producers through strong economic and social development. We aim to contribute to society by focusing on the well-being of the agricultural community. Our commitment includes promoting sustainable practices, encouraging innovation, and creating opportunities for continuous progress. We envision a future of collaborative growth where all stakeholders work together for shared prosperity and long-term sustainability.
home.objectivesDesc: Our primary objective is to create more value for our produce by organizing farmers into effective, collaborative groups. This approach not only improves the quality of our oranges but also enhances farmers' income through better production practices, collective marketing, and value addition. We are committed to building a robust, sustainable agricultural ecosystem and invite you to join us on this journey of growth and prosperity.
home.valuesDesc: The principles that guide our every decision.
home.value1Desc: Building a strong, supportive network of farmers.
home.value2Desc: Committed to environmentally conscious farming practices.
home.value3Desc: Delivering only the best produce to our customers.
home.value4Desc: Adopting new technologies and methods for better yields.

about.heroSubtitle: Step into a citrus paradise with Raut Farmer Producer Company, where the captivating world of exquisite oranges awaits your senses.
about.storyTitle: Our Story: From Helplessness to Empowerment
about.storySubtitle: How we reclaimed our value, one orange at a time.
about.farmerStruggleP1: For decades, our ancestors grew some of the finest oranges in the region. But like many farmers, we had no direct link to the market. Agents controlled everything — the rates, the grading, and even the value of our hard work. They would tell us our oranges were “too small,” the color “wasn’t right,” or the grade was “low.” For the same batch of fruit, we received three or four different prices, leaving farmers confused and helpless.
about.hiddenMarketP1: What we didn’t know then—but slowly discovered—was how the agents secretly segregated and sold our oranges. The system was designed so that the people who deserved the most didn't profit.
about.marketBullet1: High-grade fruit was exported outside India.
about.marketBullet2: Medium-grade fruit went to Kashmir, malls, and big markets.
about.marketBullet3: Semi-medium fruit was sent to local mandis.
about.marketBullet4: The lowest-grade fruit went for juice or peel powder.
about.hiddenMarketP2: They even stored fruit in cold storage for a month and sold it later at double the price. From every grade, they made more profit than the farmers who worked under the sun all year.
about.turningPointTitle: The Turning Point: Knowledge is Power
about.turningPointP1: As we studied the orange market across India, one truth became clear: farmers were losing because we didn’t have access to grading, sorting, processing, or storage. The knowledge was hidden from us.
about.turningPointP2: But step by step, we learned. We learned how to grade. We learned how to sort. We learned how to wash and wax. We learned how the market truly works. And with this knowledge, we made a powerful decision — farmers must stand together.
about.movementP1: This realization led to the creation of Raut Farmer Producer Company. A platform built by farmers, for farmers. A place where we process our own oranges, set fair prices, reduce wastage, and capture the profit that once disappeared into the pockets of middlemen. Today, many farmers who join us earn better, feel empowered, and finally receive the respect their hard work deserves.
about.movementQuote: "We are not just an orange company. We are a movement — a journey of learning, unity, and reclaiming our value."
about.whoWeAreP: This is who we are, how we started, and why we are here: to transform the lives of farmers, to bring transparency to the market, and to build a future where the hands that grow food finally prosper.
about.coreValuesDesc: At Raut Farmer Producer Company, our core values guide everything we do. We focus on excellence, unity, and innovation to maintain high quality in all our operations. Transparency and integrity help us build trust with our stakeholders, while our commitment to community welfare, environmental care, and fair practices drives our work. With a passion for citrus excellence, we ensure every orange reflects our dedication to sustainability and quality.

services.heroSubtitle: Providing end-to-end solutions to build a resilient and prosperous agricultural community.
services.workP1: At Raut Farmer Producer Company, our grading and sorting process is carried out with a blend of advanced technology and skilled human supervision. Optical sensors and automated machinery inspect each orange for size, color, texture, weight, and external quality to ensure precision and uniformity. Our trained team conducts further manual checks to remove any imperfect fruits and maintain consistent standards.
services.workP2: After grading, the oranges undergo a careful washing and waxing process. This helps remove dust, enhances the fruit's natural shine, improves shelf life, and keeps the oranges fresh during transportation. Once ready, each batch is packed using high-quality materials that protect the fruit and enhance its visual appeal.
services.workP3: Every stage adheres to strict hygiene and quality control guidelines, enabling us to produce clean, fresh, and premium-grade oranges ready for markets, retailers, and long-distance supply.
services.forFarmersSubtitle: At Raut Farmer Producer Company, we help farmers adopt innovative, sustainable techniques for long-term success, ensuring a resilient future in farming through effective resource use.
services.service1Desc: We believe the strength of agriculture lies in the prosperity of its farmers. Through precise grading and effective marketing, we help farmers get the best value for their produce. This improves their income, boosts their confidence, and supports long-term sustainable farming.
services.service2Desc: We empower farmers with instant digital payments that improve cash flow and help build a credit history for better financial access. We also use AI tools to monitor orange crops, detect diseases early, and provide timely recommendations, helping farmers reduce losses and improve productivity.
services.service3Desc: We aim to create a strong and sustainable agricultural ecosystem by ensuring fair pricing, quality produce, and expert advisory support. We encourage responsible farming practices and better use of resources, which helps farmers grow steadily and strengthens the entire agri-community.
services.ctaDesc: Contact our team to learn more about how our services can benefit you.

projects.heroSubtitle: Demonstrating our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and community empowerment in action.
projects.coldStorageDesc: Our upcoming cold storage project will help preserve the freshness and quality of oranges for a longer period. This facility will reduce post-harvest losses and ensure that farmers can supply premium fruit throughout the season.
projects.juiceExtractionDesc: Our upcoming juice extraction project will transform fresh oranges into high-quality juice for beverage processing. This initiative will enhance value addition, reduce waste, and create new market opportunities for farmers by supplying premium raw material to juice manufacturers.
projects.peelPowderDesc: Our upcoming orange peel powder project will convert fresh orange peels into a high-quality, cosmetic-grade powder rich in natural Vitamin C. This initiative will support value addition, minimize waste, and supply ingredients for skincare products like serums, masks, and sunscreens.
projects.ctaSectionText: At RAUT FARMER PRODUCER COMPANY, our logo is more than a brand; it symbolizes hope, growth, and sustainability. As we move forward in agricultural innovation, we invite you to join us in nurturing a greener, thriving future. Our commitment goes beyond business — we focus on empowering farmers, promoting sustainable practices, and building a resilient ecosystem for long-term prosperity.
projects.bottomCTADesc: We are always looking for new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project that aligns with our mission, we'd love to hear from you.
